sentences.en: ...a country rich in copper, cobalt, and diamonds.
sentences.cn: ...一个铜、钴和钻石资源丰富的国家。

sentences.en: A two - step process has been developed to recover cobalt from arsenite ores.
sentences.cn: 为了从亚砷酸盐矿中回收钴,开发了二段工艺.

sentences.en: Cobalt - based alloy is a kind of important materials used in elevated temperature.
sentences.cn: 钴基合金是一种重要的高温材料.

sentences.en: Cobalt is dissolved and arsenic precipitated with iron as scorodite.
sentences.cn: 砷与铁以臭葱石形式沉淀.

sentences.en: Common materials for the MTJ include chromium dioxide and iron cobalt alloys.
sentences.cn: 制作磁隧道结的通用材料有二氧化铬和铁钴合金.

sentences.en: Experience with Nickel and Cobalt alloys cast with grain control requirements.
sentences.cn: 有镍基和钴基合金且有晶粒要求控制要求的铸造经验.

sentences.en: Magnetic cobalt - boron alloy deposits were prepared by electroless plating.
sentences.cn: 采用化学镀制得钴硼磁性合金镀层.

sentences.en: Sixty - five percent of the special heat resistant metal in a jet engine is made of cobalt.
sentences.cn: 喷气发动机中65%的特殊耐热金属材料是用钴制造的.

sentences.en: The chief function of cobalt is to strengthen ferrite.
sentences.cn: 钴的主要作用是强化铁素体.

sentences.en: The effect of the sodium sulfite concentration on cobalt removal was investigated.
sentences.cn: 研究了氧气对除钴的影响,并试图采用亚硫酸钠来消除氧气的影响.

sentences.en: The recovery technique of cobalt in waste diamond cutter is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍利用废金刚石中的钴生产七水硫酸钴的方法.

sentences.en: The rich golden decorations on the cobalt blue ground.
sentences.cn: 对钴蓝色的地面丰富的黄金饰品.

sentences.en: They walked past stalls selling huge sprays of crimson, saffron and cobalt flowers.
sentences.cn: 他们经过很多卖花的摊位，摊位上摆着大把大把的鲜花，有深红色的，有金黄色的，还有深蓝色的。

sentences.en: This thinking led Nocera to try his cobalt - phosphate mixture.
sentences.cn: 这一思路引导纳舍埃(Nocera)尝试了钴 — 磷酸盐混合物.

sentences.en: Trace elements of: iron, copper, manganese , zinc, selenium, cobalt, molybdenum etc.
sentences.cn: 微量元素 ﹕ 铁 ﹐ 铜 ﹐ 锰 ﹐ 锌 ﹐ 硒 ﹐ 钴 ﹐ 钼等.

sentences.en: Trim numbers with H have cobalt alloy hard faced seat ring facing.
sentences.cn: 带有H的阀内件型号具有钴合金硬面阀座环表面.

trans.tran_cn: [化]钴（符号为Co），钴类颜料，深蓝色
trans.tran_en: a shiny silver-white metal that is often combined with other metals or used to give a blue colour to substances such as glass. It is a chemical element: symbol Co
